## IGlAttribute.overrideValues() method

Overwrite data in the buffer. The argument `updateId` is provided to allow multiple writes per draw, if the `updateId` is larger than the previous call's `updateId` then the modification is allowed. This resets whenever `changeId` changes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
overrideValues(entityRenderer: TGlBasicEntityRenderer, byteOffset: number, data: TTypedArray, changeId: number, updateId: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  entityRenderer | [TGlBasicEntityRenderer](./core.tglbasicentityrenderer.md) |  |
|  byteOffset | number |  |
|  data | TTypedArray |  |
|  changeId | number |  |
|  updateId | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
